children.name: mariadb:5.11.3
children.description: Fast, reliable, scalable, and easy to use open-source relational database system. MariaDB Server is intended for mission-critical, heavy-load production systems as well as for embedding into mass-deployed software. Highly available MariaDB cluster.

children.name: elasticsearch:4.7.2
children.description: A highly scalable open-source full-text search and analytics engine

name: magento:6.0.0
description: A feature-rich flexible e-commerce solution. It includes transaction options, multi-store functionality, loyalty programs, product categorization and shopper filtering, promotion rules, and more.
